Key Match Events: Patson Daka scored a late equaliser to salvage a 1-1 draw for 10-man Zambia.
Simon Msuva's 11th minute strike handed Tanzania the lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Tanzania were denied a first win at the African Cup of Nations courtesy of Zambia's late equaliser.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sunday's results left Morocco top with four points, the Congolese and Zambians on two points and Tanzania bottom on one, after two games each.

Tanzania had failed to win on their previous finals appearances in 1980 and 2019 and were not given much chance at the tournament in the Ivory Coast, especially after coach Adel Amrouche was handed an eight-match suspension on Friday.
